automation_rules.description: Temporary Automation. Applies to artists with 0-49 value for Design & Decorative Arts, Architecture and Ancient Art/Artifact. Applies a value of 100 less the maximum value of any of these.
automation_rules.satisfies:
[
	obj.genome.genes['Design and Decorative Arts'].to_i < 50,
	obj.genome.genes['Architecture'].to_i < 50,
	obj.genome.genes['Ancient Art/Artifact'].to_i < 50
].all?
automation_rules.value: 100 - max.call([obj.genome.genes['Design and Decorative Arts'] || 0, obj.genome.genes['Architecture'] || 0, obj.genome.genes['Ancient Art/Artifact'] || 0])
